>
[Loaded Dice](/Equipment.aspx?ID=3582)
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [NPC Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=236) pg. 26

**Price** 5 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held in 2 hands

**Bulk** L
</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

These dice are weighted on one side to ensure they always land with the desired number facing up. Loaded dice grant you a +1 item bonus to [Games Lore](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1333) checks to gamble with the dice.

 A creature can determine a die is loaded while handling it with a successful [secret](/Traits.aspx?ID=690) DC 20 Perception check. Determining dice are loaded without handling the dice is more difficult, especially since smart cheaters switch loaded dice in and out so they don't suspiciously roll the same number over and over. In this case, an observer must succeed at a secret Perception check against the roller's Games Lore or [Thievery](/Skills.aspx?ID=50) DC to notice the switches or the patterns.
